inputVars.name: TSF
inputVars.comment: Flag for whether to receive time stamp or not

outputVars.name: PPV
outputVars.comment: PV power output AC in W

inputVars.name: TSF
inputVars.comment: Flag for whether to receive time stamp or not

outputVars.name: PLD
outputVars.comment: PV power output AC in W

inputVars.name: FLI
inputVars.comment: Feed-in limitation in W (0 for none)

inputVars.name: LLI
inputVars.comment: Load limit in W (0 for none)

inputVars.name: DT
inputVars.comment: Frequency [min] at which to let data through

outputVars.name: FLO
outputVars.comment: Feed-in limitation in W (0 for none)

outputVars.name: LLO
outputVars.comment: Load limit in W (0 for none)

outputVars.name: RO
outputVars.comment: Rejection reason indicator. TRUE: Not enough time passed; FALSE: Currently locked

eventOutputs.name: UD
eventOutputs.comment: Memory update request for PowerForecaster FBs

inputVars.name: RS
inputVars.comment: Frequency [min] to send out FREQ event

inputVars.name: TLB
inputVars.comment: Time frame to look back when generating forecasts in h

inputVars.name: TLF
inputVars.comment: Time frame to forecast ahead (look forward) in h

inputVars.name: TLF
inputVars.comment: Time frame to forecast ahead (and look back) in h

inputVars.name: TLF
inputVars.comment: Time frame forecasted ahead (looked forward) in h

inputVars.name: PDIFF
inputVars.comment: Power difference forecast in W (negative = PV deficit, positive = PV surplus)

inputVars.name: FL
inputVars.comment: Feed-in limitation in W (0 for none)

inputVars.name: LL
inputVars.comment: Load limit in W (0 for none)

outputVars.name: PBR
outputVars.comment: Battery charge/discharge roadmap (Power in W, positive = charge, negative = discharge, 15 min resolved)

inputVars.name: TLF
inputVars.comment: Time frame forecasted ahead (looked forward) in h

inputVars.name: PBR
inputVars.comment: Battery charge (positive)/discharge (negative) roadmap (power in W) over the forecast horizon

inputVars.name: PDIFF
inputVars.comment: Power difference forecast in W (negative = PV deficit, positive = PV surplus)

inputVars.name: FL
inputVars.comment: Feed-in limitation in W (0 for none)

inputVars.name: LL
inputVars.comment: Load limit in W (0 for none)

outputVars.name: PB
outputVars.comment: Set battery charging power in W (positive = charge, negative = discharge)
